title: 이달의소녀탐구 #458 (LOONA TV #458)
summary:
0:01 -- Go Won says that she'll do her best.
0:09 -- Hyejoo mentions that she'll drink the Cheongsimhwan (the calming drink) and she has never had it before.
0:15 -- Go Won is disgusted by the smell but drinks it all.
0:24 -- Yves is nervous as well as she has to perform in front of her fans.
0:30 -- JinSoul tells Go Won that she looks like a cartoon character and it looks like she is wearing British private school uniforms.
0:41 -- HyunJin mentions that she'll cheer her up. Go Won asks since when did she do so much for her. HyunJin: "If you get nervous, it's your loss!"
0:54 -- All of yyxy is nervous before their performance.
